title: Abakoo 54.6V 4A Battery Charger Power Supply Adapter for 48V 13S Lithium Battery with 3-Pin XLR Connector
features: Fast Charging - Output 54.6V 4A, Input 100-120VAC, faster charging speed to save your time.
Aluminum Shell, Durable and cooling faster
LED indicator lamp glows red when charging and green when charging is complete.This is an automatic battery charger which turns itself off when the charging cycle is complete to prevent overcharging.

Multiple Safety Protections - Overcurrent protection, overvoltage protection, short circuit protection, overheating protection, overcharge protection. Multiple safety protection designs make you safer and more assured in use.
description: Before ordering, please make sure that the connector of the old charger is the same as ours. 54.6V 4A battery charger, the rated charging voltage is 54.6V, suitable for 48V- 54.6V lithium battery.  1. If you receive a damaged item by the shipping, Please don't use the damaged item to charge. 2. Please use the products within one year. 3. Do not use over 12 hour per charge time. 4. Please charge in a ventilated environment. 5. Please don't cover the charger. 6. Please make sure your hands and the plugs are dry.
1. Input parameters: 100-120VAC 2. Output parameters: 54.6V 4A 13S 3. Type of working battery: 48V Lithium Battery 4. Connecter size: Male 3-Pin XLR
categories: Jump Starters, Battery Chargers & Portable Power
